required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long Term Prospective Uncontrolled Study Of Earfold™ For The Treatment Of Prominent Ears
clinical_study.official_title: FOLD: Long Term Prospective Uncontrolled Study Of Earfold™ For The Treatment Of Prominent Ears

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, prospective, uncontrolled, single arm, post-marketing study of the long-term safety and performance of EARFOLD® Implantable Clip System.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Ears Appearance Questionnaire score
primary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Ears Appearance Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Not at all, 2=A little bit, 3=Quite a bit, 4=Very much)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Ears Appearance overall score at 12 months post-implantation
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Ears Appearance Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Not at all, 2=A little bit, 3=Quite a bit, 4=Very much)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Ears Appearance overall score at 24 months post-implantation
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Ears Appearance Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Not at all, 2=A little bit, 3=Quite a bit, 4=Very much)

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients that require re-operation at any moment
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients that require re-operation at any moment during the investigational period

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with recurrence of ear prominence
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients with recurrence of ear prominence at any moment during the investigational period

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-12 score at Month 3 for subjects over 18 years
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-12 Health Survey will be administered to subjects over 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-12 score at Month 12 for subjects over 18 years
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-12 Health Survey will be administered to subjects over 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-12 score at Month 24 for subjects over 18 years
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-12 Health Survey will be administered to subjects over 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-10 score at Month 3 for subjects under 18 years old
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-10 Health Survey will be administered to subjects under 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-10 score at Month 12 for subjects under 18 years old
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-10 Health Survey will be administered to subjects under 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline of Short Form-10 score at Month 24 for subjects under 18 years old
secondary_outcome.description: The Short Form-10 Health Survey will be administered to subjects under 18 years old to measure health and well-being

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in maximum helix to scalp distance from before PREFOLD® insertion at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with untreated ears compared to EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in maximum helix to scalp distance from before PREFOLD® insertion at Month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with untreated ears compared to EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in maximum helix to scalp distance from before PREFOLD® insertion at Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with untreated ears compared to EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Maintenance of maximum helix to scalp distance at 12 months compared to 3 months visit post insertion of EARFOLD
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with EARFOLD inserted

secondary_outcome.measure: Maintenance of maximum helix to scalp distance at 24 months compared to 3 months visit post insertion of EARFOLD
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with EARFOLD inserted

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in maximum helix to scalp distance from PREFOLD® insertion to post insertion distances at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with PREFOLD® in compared with EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in maximum helix to scalp distance from PREFOLD® insertion to post insertion distances at Month 12
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with PREFOLD® in compared with EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in maximum helix to scalp distance from PREFOLD® insertion to post insertion distances at Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: Helix to scalp distance with PREFOLD® in compared with EARFOLD in

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of EARFOLD® insertion procedure
secondary_outcome.description: From the first incision of the scalpel to the last application of the sterristrip over the wound, duration of surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire at Month 12
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire at Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Social Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire at Month 12
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire at Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q School Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire at Month 12
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline pre-insertion in EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire at Month 24
secondary_outcome.description: EAR-Q Psychological Function Questionnaire is on a 4 point scale (1=Never, 2=Sometimes, 3=Often, 4=Always)

secondary_outcome.measure: Return to normal activities questionnaire after EARFOLD® surgery at Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Return to normal activities questionnaire is on a 11-point scale ranging from 10=strongly agree to 0=strongly disagree

arm_group.description: EARFOLD® implant is inserted subcutaneously using the sterile disposable EARFOLD® introducer under local anaesthetic

intervention.description: EARFOLD® implant is inserted subcutaneously using the sterile disposable EARFOLD® introducer under local anaesthetic

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects who have ear prominence and/or have significant asymmetry
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects planning to use EARFOLD® in conjunction with other procedures (e.g. cartilage scoring, conchal reduction or concho-mastoid sutures) for correction of prominent ears are excluded
- Patients with impaired healing (e.g., current smokers, diabetic patients, patients with autoimmune disorders such as Ehlers-Danlos Syndrome or Scleroderma)
- Patients with an active infection, local or systemic
- Patients with known nickel or gold allergies.

link.description: Additional information on study locations near you may be found at AllerganClinicalTrials.com. For any study not on AllerganClinicalTrials.com, please contact IR-CTRegistration@Allergan.com for assistance.
